mapper.select: SELECT C.CAREGIVERS_NO, CAREGIVERS_NAME, CAREGIVERS_AGE, CAREGIVERS_GENDER, CAREGIVERS_TEL, CAREGIVERS_EXPERIENCE, CAREGIVERS_WORK_HOURS, CAREGIVERS_ROLE FROM CAREGIVERS C WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.CAREGIVERS_NO = C.CAREGIVERS_NO ) ORDER BY C.CAREGIVERS_NO ASC
